name: Raspberry-pi-ntp-server-lcd-display
tagline: Python program for displaying time and statistics on an Adafruit CharPlate LCD on a Raspberry Pi NTP Server.
body:
### Raspberry Pi NTP PPS Server LCD display
![LCD Display](http://www.jackenhack.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/IMG_4229.jpg)
This little program uses the [Adafruit LCD CharPlate](https://www.adafruit.com/products/1115) to display the status of a Raspberry Pi NTP server connected to a GPSDO and a 1 PPS source.
### Views
There are different views, like clock, number of clients connected, jitter, performance etc. More will be added
[**See video here**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Kd9gk_F3spI&feature=youtu.be)
